trees.name: Master Notes
trees.organizingPrinciple: Universal Knowledge Base. Organized by Domain (Tech/Personal), Project, and Status.
trees.placementStrategy: Sort into 'Active Projects', 'Reference', 'Archives', or 'Journal'. Create new sub-categories if topic is novel.

trees.name: Infinite Context Log
trees.organizingPrinciple: Episodic Narrative. Organized Hierarchically by: 1. Epoch/Year, 2. Session/Project Thread, 3. Interaction Phase (e.g., 'Problem Statement', 'Exploration', 'Resolution').
trees.placementStrategy: Place chronologically under the active Session ID. If the conversation shifts topic significantly, create a new Phase node under the same Session. Do NOT merge distinct sessions.

forbiddenConcepts: omitting code blocks or specific configuration values
merging distinct dissenting arguments into a single consensus
losing the chronological order of events
requiredContext: Unique identifiers (File names, Error codes, Variable names)

trees.name: Codebase Map
trees.organizingPrinciple: Software Architecture. Group by Module, Component, and Layer.
